laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Bayley Scales of Infant Development II (BSID-II)
Korean Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children-III
laboratory_examinations.findings: Total intelligence quotient (TIQ) was 31, indicating severe intellectual disability
Blood lactic acid, pyruvic acid, amino acids, and urine organic acid tests showed no abnormal findings

laboratory_examinations.date: First MRI not specified, follow-up at 9 years of age and 19 years of age
laboratory_examinations.findings: First MRI showed no significant abnormalities; follow-up MRI at 9 years showed mild atrophy of the bilateral cerebellum; follow-up MRI at 19 years showed no significant changes compared to the previous MRI.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild atrophy of the bilateral cerebellum observed at 9 years; no significant changes at 19 years
